issue.title: dead rules
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.56

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

-

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots



**! Social**

```
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/f116fcc69b7f301ff90f1b5de14d26e9dfe64f15
atvavrupa.tv##.social-container

https://forum.adguard.com/index.php?threads/resolved-evrensel-net.23640/
evrensel.net##.fa-pinterest

https://forum.adguard.com/index.php?threads/resolved-5-websites.17440/post-117935

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/da3312ff3242007427f33fe1d06c3b4675683031

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/dcab86c9ac06fc6e26111564fec2a8f69add8e9b
kentteyasam.com##.rhd-social-box-wrapper

https://forum.adguard.com/index.php?threads/resolved-medyatava-com-social-buttons.14798/

https://forum.adguard.com/index.php?threads/resolved-6-missed-ads.7932/#post-69660

https://forum.adguard.com/index.php?threads/resolved-6-missed-ads.11225/#post-87718

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/16593#issue-324710215

https://forum.adguard.com/index.php?threads/resolved-webtekno-com-hiding-rule-needed.10094/#post-81209
webtekno.com##div[class^="share-counter"]

```

---

**! Tr**

```
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/f1c67bd60513dea0f010eb3374a4974ca62268fb

!

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/5deaef9c75a1e59f138d51155e6d6e64d01cae19
```

issue.title: www.sbs.com.au
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.sbs.com.au/ondemand/watch/1972771395804](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sbs.com.au%2Fondemand%2Fwatch%2F1972771395804) ### Comment Username: @derpina-derpington > I am finding this same message is happening on a lot of sites - saying that I am using a adblocker when I have whitelisted the site/turned off adblocking. It's really annoying. It's most often when I am trying to watch videos. Especially annoying when it's a video in my own country on a computer not using a VPN etc. ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://bbs.kafan.cn/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbbs.kafan.cn%2F) ### Comment Username: @KevinGu0611 > I can't open the bbs.kafan.cn when using AdGuard. I have attached screenshots and pictures of the filter logs. When opening AdGuard, the website has been in the state of checking the browser and cannot be entered. No matter how long you wait, the website is checking the browser. ### Screenshots

issue.title: Google Play: exam.RealtimeSubway
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=exam.RealtimeSubway](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dexam.RealtimeSubway) ### Comment > 안녕하세요. > AdGuard 잘 사용하고 있는 대한민국 유저입니다. > > 다른 앱은 괜찮은데 유독 이 'RealtimeSubway'(한국명 실시간지하철) 앱을 사용할 때만 광고 문제가 자주 발생합니다. > > 우선 문제 발생 시마다 캐시 및 앱 데이터 삭제, AdGuard 재실행은 반드시 하고있습니다. > 그리고 해당 앱의 개별 Https 설정 등도 다 했고, 로그 필터링도 이상해보이는건 다 추가했습니다. > > 해당 앱 시작 시 뜨는 전체 광고가 있는데 데이터 삭제 후 하루이틀 정도 안뜨다가 다시 생깁니다. > 한번 뜨면 캐시가 남는지 계속 생겨서 그때마다 앱 데이터를 삭제해주고 있습니다. > 그러면 며칠 괜찮다가 다시 발생합니다. > 동일 시간 AdGuard 정상 작동 중이며 다른 앱들은 문제없이 적용 중이었습니다. > > 그리고 앱에서 역 정보 화면으로 들어가면 작은 광고가 계속 뜹니다. > AdGuard 를 쓰고 나선 깨져서 보일 때도 있으나 실제 광고가 나올 때도 있습니다. > 처음에 바로 뜨진 않고 1, 2초 지나서 스크린샷처럼 자리가 밀려나면서 뜹니다. > > 자주 사용하는 앱인데 이 앱만 유독 문제가 자주 생겨서 아쉽습니다. > 꼭 도와주세요. > > 감사합니다. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/tvfouz23cr4c0gcwk4gsk0c448044owtn7g09taj5c.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/44qewou5mq4go0cc4w4o4w00ssk4wcw5tjy5pz5bxk.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/1rd1krf2mr0gwgcog8sww0c80co0woscppvji9ordk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Android 13 AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v3.6.10 (51) AdGuard mode: | VPN Filtering quality: | High-quality HTTPS filtering: | enabled Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt, DnsUserRules` Filters: | Other:
AdGuard DNS

Language-specific:
YousList,

issue.title: www.microsoft.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=49117](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fdownload%2Fdetails.aspx%3Fid%3D49117) ### Comment > Yo ya tuve AdGuard hace 2 semanas pero lo desinstale porque una pagina me detectaba addblocker y yo ya lo había deshabilitado y me seguida detectando addblocker, entonces decidí desinstalarlo, ahora lo instale otra vez y pues cuando estoy navegando en la web, al cargar lo que estoy buscando, demora en cargar y solo es en este navegado (Edge) entonces no se si será mi internet aunque lo dudo porque tengo buen internet o no se si será AdGuard que hace que vaya lentas mis búsquedas. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/f7nlc54f05ws0ogosgo08sw4sookgs893kv2i4j1bk.png?nc=1)

issue.title: unmightboxen.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.50.1b6

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

unmightboxen.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
`unmightboxen.com` is no longer needed, the domain is invalid.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
